segments.text: What's all the security check about , Jimmy ? Does it mean the bar may be a dangerous place ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , of course not . Just in case . Nothing to worry about . Don't you also do this in China ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . Maybe the same . Actually , this is my first time being in a bar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , then it's my honor to be here with you . I can see now why you've been so curious about the bar stuff . You like this place ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . I love this place , especially the decoration . So tasteful !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . Other than that , the real feature are the excellent drinks . Can I have your ticket ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here it is . But , what for ? We're already in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , with the ticket , you can get a free drink . What would you like ? Orange juice ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , orange juice will be fine for me . But how can you get the drink ? It's so crowded there around the counter . You can barely move .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll show you how . The bar tenders know whose turn it is . And also , I can snap my fingers to catch his attention .
segments.speaker: S2
